mixed-citation.article-title: Six new species of Tipula (Vestiplex) Bezzi (Diptera, Tipulidae) from Tibet

tp:taxon-treatment.tp:nomenclature:
Tipula ( Vestiplex ) divisotergata
group in Tibet

tp:treatment-sec.p:
Figs 13–20.
Tipula ( Vestiplex ) uncinella
sp. nov. , holotype, ♂ (CAU). 13 . Hypopygium, lateral view. 14 . Inner gonostylus, lateral external view. 15 . Adminiculum, ventral view and oblique view. 16 . Outer gonostylus, lateral external view. 17 . Tergite nine, dorsal view. 18–19 . Semen pump, lateral view and dorsal view. 20 . Hypopygium, ventral view. Abbreviations: see Material and methods. Scale bars: 13, 17, 20 = 0.5 mm; 14–16, 18–19 = 0.1 mm.
